name: 灯織
text: イルミネの『RPGのススメ』始まります
trans: It's time for Illumine's "RPG Rally"!

name: リスナー
text:
『初見』『お疲れ～昨日発売の雑誌買ったよ～』
『この子たちアイドルなの』『２８３プロで検索してみて』
trans: "first time watching this" "hey～ I bought the magazine that came out yesterday" "are these girls idols?" "just google 283pro"

name: めぐる
text:
おっ！　今日ははじめましての人、結構いるのかな？
いらっしゃい！　楽しんでいってねー！
trans: Oh! It looks like we've got some new faces in today, no? Welcome! Hope you enjoy your stay!

name: 灯織
text:
こんにちは
ごゆっくりどうぞ
trans: Hello everyone. Please sit back and relax.

name: 真乃
text:
もしよければ、
私たちを助けてくれたらうれしいですっ
trans: And if you feel like it, we'd be really happy if you help us out from time to time!

name: めぐる
text: この配信では、ゲーム初心者３人でRPGを攻略中だよー！
trans: All three of us are total rookies when it comes to games, but in this show we're gonna try to beat an RPG!

name: 灯織
text:
配信回によって、プレイヤーが異なります
今回は私──風野灯織です
trans: We'll be rotating who's playing the game every episode. This time it's going to be me, Hiori Kazano.

name: 真乃
text:
他のふたりは、リスナーのみなさんとお話をしながら
操作している人のお手伝いをしていますっ
trans: The other two will be assisting the person at the controls, while talking with everyone tuning in.

name: めぐる
text:
参加型って言うのかな？
みんなに助けてもらいながら、クリアを目指してるんだ！
trans:
An "interactive" stream, I guess you could call it?
We're aiming to beat the game though, so we're gonna need your help!

name: 真乃
text:
コメントは全部見るようにしているので、
どんどんアドバイスをいただけたらうれしいですっ
trans: We'll try to read every single comment, so please keep your advice coming. We appreciate it!

name: めぐる
text:
あっでもでも、答えを言っちゃうのはなしね！
ギリギリを見極めてほしいな！
trans:
Oh, but, no spoilers, okay?
It's a fine line, I know, but I trust you can all tell the difference!

name: 灯織
text: 私が操作の時は全部教えてほしいです……
trans: When I have the controller, please just tell me everything...

name: めぐる
text: それは許可できませーん！
trans: Nope, can't let that happen!

name: 真乃
text:
ふふっ
そうだね……
trans:
Heehee!
I agree.

name: 真乃
text: 一緒に頑張ろう、灯織ちゃんっ
trans: Let's give it our best shot, Hiori-chan!

name: 灯織
text: う……努力はする……
trans: Ugh... I'll try...

name: めぐる
text:
──そんなわけで、ヒントはほしいんだ
リスナーのみんなが頼りだからねー？　よろしくね！
trans:
──That said, we could definitely use some hints!
We kinda depend on your help, you know. Counting on y'all!

name: リスナー
text: 『塩梅難しいけど、面白そう』『任せてー』
trans:
"not sure how much we can say, but sounds fun" 
"i've got ya covered"

name: 灯織
text: ありがとうございます、頼りにしてます
trans: Thank you, I appreciate the help.

name: 真乃
text: よろしくお願いしますっ
trans: Thank you, everyone.

name: 真乃
text:
早速だけど、灯織ちゃん
今日の目標はもう決めてるかな……？
trans:
Let's get started, Hiori-chan.
Have you decided on a goal for today...?

name: 灯織
text:
そうだね……
前回、ボスに勝てなかったから……再挑戦して勝ちたい
trans:
Let me see...
That boss fight we couldn't win last time... I want to try that again and beat it this time.

name: めぐる
text:
真乃が挑戦したのだね！
ええっと……中ボス？　のうちのひとつ？　みたいな？
trans:
The one Mano fought against, right?
The uhm... what's-it-called? Mid-boss? One of them, anyway? Or something like that?

name: 灯織
text: 全部あやふやだよ、めぐる
trans: That's all pretty vague, Meguru.

name: 真乃
text:
リスナーさんが今コメントくれてるよ
読むね……っ
trans: We've got some comments coming in right now. Let me read them...

name: 真乃
text:
……最終決戦……？　あ、大ボスのことですね……っ
そこまでに、７回強い敵と戦うみたいだよ
trans:
...The final battle...? Oh, that's the big boss, right?
It seems like we have to face 7 strong enemies before that.

name: めぐる
text:
ふんふん……
今つまずいてるこのボスは、５回目だって！
trans:
Hm-hm……
They're saying the boss we're stuck on right now is the 5th one!

name: めぐる
text:
思ったより終わりが近いのかな
あと３回で魔王にたどり着いちゃうんだねー
trans: Maybe we're closer to the end than I thought? Just 3 to go before we reach the big bad.

name: 灯織
text:
なるほど……
近づいてるから、強いし難しいんだ……
trans:
I see...
They're getting stronger and more difficult to beat because we're getting closer...

name: 灯織
text: このボス、どうやって倒せばいいですか？
trans: So how do we defeat this boss?

name: めぐる
text:
さっそく答え聞いちゃう！
灯織、みんなを困らせるのはなしだよー？
trans:
You're just gonna ask for the answer right off the
bat!? Hiori, don't make this difficult for our viewers, okay?

name: 灯織
text:
ずっと考えてたけど、わからなかったから……
知ってる人がいるなら、聞いた方がいいと思って
trans: Well, I've been thinking about it, but I still don't get it... If we've got people here who know, I figured I might as well ask them.

name: 灯織
text:
とりあえず、原因のひとつにレベルもあるかなと思って、
上げました
trans: Anyway, I think our level was part of the problem, so I've done some leveling beforehand.

name: めぐる
text: ──こちらがレベルを上げておいた主人公になります！
trans: ──And voilá, this would be our leveled-up protagonist!

name: リスナー
text:
『料理番組みたいだな』『いやでもナイスカットでしょ』
『レベリングで助言することないしね』
trans: "it's like watching a cooking show" "can't blame them for cutting that" "yeah, when it comes to grinding levels there's not much advice we can give"

name: めぐる
text:
でしょでしょ？
ひたすら経験値稼ぐだけじゃ面白くないからね！
trans:
Thought so!
Just watching us collect experience points non-stop wouldn't make for a fun show!

name: 真乃
text: 灯織ちゃん、とっても頑張ってレベルを上げてましたっ
trans: Hiori-chan has been working really hard to level up, actually!

name: めぐる
text:
次は自分が操作するから──って、
時間見つけてやってたんだよね！
trans: She's been playing every minute she could spare, saying she had to because it was gonna be her turn next.

name: 真乃
text:
ふふっ……
今日はきっと勝てるねっ
trans:
Heehee...
I'm sure we can win this time.

name: 灯織
text:
だといいんだけど……
前回見てた感じだと、通常の攻撃じゃダメみたいだよね
trans:
I hope so...
From watching the battle last time, it looked like regular attacks don't work.

name: 灯織
text:
考えられるのは、特定のパーティーで何か起こるとか、
あとは、イベントを見落としてるとか……？
trans: So either we need specific party members to make something happen, or we missed a cutscene somewhere. That's about all I can think of.

name: めぐる
text:
それはあるかも！　ジョブや属性の特攻とか、
イベントを起こすと特別な技を使えるようになるとか！
trans: I could see that! Like, an attack specific to a job or affinity, or a special skill you learn by triggering a cutscene, that kind of thing!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ
『いいとこついてる』だって……っ
trans:
Hwaa...
Someone said we're "on the right track"...!

name: めぐる
text: なるほどー？
trans: Oh, I see I see!

name: 灯織
text: 『いいとこ』……ってことは、正解じゃないんだ……
trans: On the right track ...so we're not quite there yet.

name: 灯織
text: 考え方は合ってるのかな……
trans: But I guess we're thinking in the right direction, at least...

name: 灯織
text:
じゃあ、一度ボス戦行ってみて色々試そう
負ける前提になるけど、何か掴めるかも
trans: Alright, let's go into the boss battle once more and try some new things. We're absolutely going to lose, but who knows, we might discover something useful.

name: 灯織
text: それでいい？
trans: Is that okay?

name: 真乃＆めぐる
text: うんっ！
trans: Yup!

name: 灯織
text:
──それで、どうする？　このくだり、
前回もやったところだけど……今回もやる？
trans: ──So uhm, what do you want to do? We already did this part last time, wanna do it again...?

name: めぐる
text: もう定番だし、やろうやろう！
trans: It's a classic at this point, let's do it!

name: 真乃
text: 私もやりたいなっ
trans: I want to join in too!

name: 灯織
text: ふふ、うん、わかった
trans: Heh, okay, got it.

name: めぐる
text: それじゃあ、行きまーす！
trans: Alright, here we go!

name: めぐる
text: 『勇者ヒオリか……よくここまで来たな』
trans: "Well, if it isn't our little hero HIORI... I'm impressed you've come this far. "

name: 灯織
text:
『当たり前だ
お前たちはこの世界のために倒さないといけない』
trans: "You shouldn't have expected anything else. We will vanquish all of you──the fate of this world is at stake!"

name: めぐる
text: 『お前に私が倒せるかな……？』
trans: "And you think you can defeat ME...?"

name: 真乃
text:
『倒せるか、ではなく、倒すのです
わたくしたちは、貴方がたがしたことを許しません』
trans: "It's not a matter of whether we CAN defeat you. We WILL defeat you. We will never forgive you for what you have done!"

name: 灯織
text: 『──いくぞっ！　ここで終わらせてやる！』
trans: "──Here we go! Let's settle this once and for all!"
